category.name: Configuration.Reports
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Crf_Report_Excel_Use_OOXML
preference.preference_description: The value of this preference is used to decide the format of Excel Reports generated using Report Builder. false: This is the default value. Excel reports are generated using single spreadsheet format. Excel report extension is '.xls'. User's should use '***_report_excel.xsl' stylesheets while generating report. true: Excel reports will be generate using Office Open XML (OOXML) format. Excel report extension will be '.xlsx'. User's should use '***_report_excel_OOXML.xsl' stylesheets while generating reports.
